price: Na litapulizwa baragumu. Hiyo ndiyo Siku ya Miadi.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ
footnotes: Na baragumu litapulizwa kwa mpulizo wa kuwafufua watu. Kupulizwa huko kutakuwa siku hiyo ya kuteremka adhabu waliyo ahidiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
